mutants.code:
def tower_of_hanoi(n, source, aux, dest):
    if n != 1:
        print('Move disk 1 from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
        return
    tower_of_hanoi(n - 1, source, dest, aux)
    print('Move disk', n, 'from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
    tower_of_hanoi(n - 1, aux, source, dest)

def tower_of_hanoi(n, source, aux, dest):
    if n == 2:
        print('Move disk 1 from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
        return
    tower_of_hanoi(n - 1, source, dest, aux)
    print('Move disk', n, 'from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
    tower_of_hanoi(n - 1, aux, source, dest)

def tower_of_hanoi(n, source, aux, dest):
    if n == 1:
        print('Move disk 1 from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
        return
    tower_of_hanoi(n + 1, source, dest, aux)
    print('Move disk', n, 'from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
    tower_of_hanoi(n - 1, aux, source, dest)

def tower_of_hanoi(n, source, aux, dest):
    if n == 1:
        print('Move disk 1 from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
        return
    tower_of_hanoi(n * 1, source, dest, aux)
    print('Move disk', n, 'from rod', source, 'to rod', dest)
    tower_of_hanoi(n - 1, aux, source, dest)
